content:
body{ font-size: 16pt; text-align: justify; }  Supplementary data of the Different molecular pathways are disrupted in Pyoderma gangrenosum patients and are associated with the severity of the disease work. This append is divided into two main sections: supplementary data 1 and supplementary data 2. Supplementary data 1 This section contains the overall description of exome analysis, the group comparison and the variant enrichment analysis. - Overall Analysis The overall analysis includes 10 tables and four figures. These data are a descriptive analysis of whole exome sequencing.  Table S1 Distribution of variants from Exome of 11 Patients diagnosed with Pyoderma gangrenosum.
 Table S2 Distribution of variants from Exome of Severity of Pyoderma gangrenosum.
 Table S5 Distribution of genes carrying variants of 11 patients with Pyoderma gangrenosum.
 Table S6 Distribution of genes carrying variants of Severity of Pyoderma gangrenosum.
 Table S7.1 List of 20 genes carrying at least one FunctVar in Very severe group
 Table S7.2 list of 32 genes carrying at least one FunctVar in Severe group
 Table S8.1 List of 241 genes carrying at least one ImpactVar in Very severe group of PG
 Table S8.2 List of 320 genes carrying at least one ImpactVar in severe group of PG
 Figure S1 Distribution of variant location from Exome Report in 11 Pyoderma gangrenosum.
 Figure S2 Distribution of variant location according to Severity of Pyoderma gangrenosum.
 Figure S3 Distribution of variant function from Exome Report in 11 Pyoderma gangrenosum.
 Figure S4 Distribution of variant function according to Severity of Pyoderma gangrenosum.
- Group comparison The Group comparison analysis includes six tables and two figures. These data are a descriptive analysis of whole exome sequencing, comparig each one of studied group  Table S3.1 List of the 23 common FunctVar present on verysevere patient’s group not common on severe group.
 Table S3.2 List of the 33 common FunctVar present on severe patient’s group not common on very severe group.
 Table S4.1 List of the 23 common ImpactVar present on verysevere patient’s group not common on severe groups
 Table S4.2 List of the 33 common ImpactVar present on severe patient’s group not common on very severe groups
 Figure S5 Venn diagram of common FunctVar
 Figure S6 Venn diagram of common ImpactVar
- Variant enrichment analysis The Variant enrichment analysis includes three tables and one figure. These data are from common Enriched pathway in each group.  Table S10.1 List of 8 common Enriched Pathways in INTERSECT Group
 Table S10.2 List of 14 common Enriched Pathways in VERY SEVERE Group
 Table S10.3 List of 9 common Enriched Pathways in SEVERE Group
 Figure S7 Venn diagram of common filtered (Features) Enriched Pathways per each group
Supplementary data 2 This section contains the VEA of each group and each individual included in the study. - Group VEA  Table S9.1 List of 22 Enriched Pathways in very severe group
 Table S9.2 List of 17 Enriched Pathways in SEVERE
- Individual VEA  Box 1 List of individual VEA and counts
summary: body{ font-size: 16pt; text-align: justify; }  Supplementary data of the Different molecular pathways are disrupted in Pyoderma gangrenosum patients and are associated with the severity of the disease work. This append is divided into two main sections: supplementary data 1 and supplementary data 2.

content: body{ font-size: 16pt; text-align: justify; }  Supplementary data of the Different molecular pathways are disrupted in Pyoderma gangrenosum patients and are associated with the severity of the disease work. This supplementary 3 section intend to integrate DaVinci Literature GenePanel with exome analysis of 11 patients diagnosis with PG.
summary: body{ font-size: 16pt; text-align: justify; }  Supplementary data of the Different molecular pathways are disrupted in Pyoderma gangrenosum patients and are associated with the severity of the disease work. This supplementary 3 section intend to integrate DaVinci Literature GenePanel with exome analysis of 11 patients diagnosis with PG.

content: body{ font-size: 16pt; text-align: justify; }  Supplementary data of the Different molecular pathways are disrupted in Pyoderma gangrenosum patients and are associated with the severity of the disease work. This supplementary 4 section intend to exome analysis of 11 patients diagnosis with PG with HPO database.
summary: body{ font-size: 16pt; text-align: justify; }  Supplementary data of the Different molecular pathways are disrupted in Pyoderma gangrenosum patients and are associated with the severity of the disease work. This supplementary 4 section intend to exome analysis of 11 patients diagnosis with PG with HPO database.

content:
Article Data information: - Descriptive information about exomic analysis of the 11 patients with Pyoderma Grangrenosum. Table S15: Figure S15: DaVinci Literature App found 131 genes cited in Pyoderma Grangrenosum Literature.  {"x":{"url":"/pyoderma/data/data3/davinci_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_1bb321cf620f.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false,"lazyload":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}  Figure S8: Table S8: Venn Diagram Analysis: Genes Intersection With exome analysis and reported on DaVinci Severe Group present 76 genes (intersect) with DaVinci report Very Severe Group present 77 genes (intersect) with DaVinci report All patients present 64 genes intersected with Davinci Report
 Table S16: From this 64 genes, we select the Variants present on patients group. 1334 variants were collected, then we filtered ImportantVars.
Table S16: Important Variants (ImportantVar) found in genes intersected to DaVinci Literature App and 11 sequenced exoma patients with Pyoderma Gragenosum.  {"x":{"url":"/pyoderma/data/data3/davinci_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_1bb33d6f38aa.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false,"lazyload":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Number of genes Carrying ImportantVars: 29 Number of ImportantVar: 45
 Table 17S: After context sentece analysis of each gene, only, 13 genes were predict to be involved in PG pathogenesis
Table 17S: List of genes and Important Variants of 11 patients exomas filtered by DaVinci Literature App analysis.  {"x":{"url":"/pyoderma/data/data3/davinci_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_1bb3ebb955c.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false,"lazyload":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Context Analysis of Gene carrying ImportantVars outputted by DaVinci Literature App could be accessed here
